item.title: Save up to 53% on top-selling laptops for Prime Day
item.description: Is your current laptop on its last legs? Or, are you doing some back-to-school shopping for a new device for a student heading off to college this fall? The2025 Amazon Prime Day dealsare live now throughFriday, July 11, and big ticket tech is on sale across all the biggest brands.
